title: The Air Force Academy
author: VD
content_html: Are there any regulars here who attended the academy? I’m interested in obtaining a description of the course program for the four years there. I’m also interested in knowing how pilots are sorted into their various occupations.
content_text: Are there any regulars here who attended the academy?  I’m interested in obtaining a description of the course program for the four years there.  I’m also interested in knowing how pilots are sorted into their various occupations.
